FuncDef: The reset arp-check statistics command resets statistics about discarded invalid ARP packets on a specific interface board.
CLIs: reset arp-check { check-destination-ip | check-valid } statistics slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Resets statistics about discarded ARP packets with invalid destination IP addresses.
-

Resets statistics about discarded invalid ARP packets.
-

Specifies the slot ID of an interface board.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset arp-check statistics command is used to reset statistics about invalid ARP packets on a specific interface board. Statistics about invalid ARP packets can be reset by destination IP address or ARP packet validity.
